thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Penn Virginia Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.68

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Penn Virginia Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.68
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Penn Virginia Corp:
* PENN VIRGINIA REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS AND PROVIDES OPERATIONAL UPDATE
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.68 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.01 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REAFFIRMS 2018 PRODUCTION GROWTH GUIDANCE OF 125% * PRODUCED APPROXIMATELY 1.5 MILLION BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT IN QUARTER
* APRIL 2018 ESTIMATED PRODUCTION AVERAGED MORE THAN DOUBLE AVERAGE PRODUCTION RATE FOR 2017
* CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO TOTAL BETWEEN $320 AND $360 MILLION
* PLANS TO FUND ITS 2018 CAPITAL PLANS WITH CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS AND BORROWINGS UNDER ITS CREDIT FACILITY
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $77.2 MILLION VERSUS $35 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $66.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
